Andreas Pick

About

I am an Associate Professor at the Econometric Institute of the Erasmus School of Economics and an Economist at the research department of De Nederlandsche Bank. I am affiliated with the Tinbergen Institute, ERIM, and the CESifo Institute.

Before joining Erasmus and DNB, I was a post-doc at the Economics Faculty in Cambridge and an Economist at the UK Debt Management Office. I have a PhD from the University of Cambridge and an undergrad degree from Humboldt University Berlin.
